Workflow.Name: Civil Aviation Document Review Field Control
Workflow.Description: If the work order is for a Civil Aviation Document Review, then hide the remote field and show the recommendation field. Otherwise, hide recommendation field and show the remote field.

LocalizedName.description: Civil Aviation Document Review Field Control

Description.description: If the work order is for a Civil Aviation Document Review, then hide the remote field and show the recommendation field. Otherwise, hide recommendation field and show the remote field.
